summary: Cheng Li-sheung is a young, upwardly mobile professional finally ready to invest in her first home. But when the deal falls through, she is forced to keep her dream alive - even if it means keeping her would-be neighbors dead.
cast: Josie Ho|Ching Wong|Helen To|Man Jan San|Cindy Yu|Lai-Ling Chan|Eason Chan|Chow Fei Kin|Michelle Ye|Jo Kuk|Dewi Ariyantl|Vivian Leung|Chung-man Pow|Cheng Hao Sum|Hee Ching Paw|Hoi-Pang Lo|Norman Chu|Chow Chung Hay|Che Kim Au Yeung|Kon Chung Tam|Chung-Yiu Yeung|Lap-Man Tan|Yiu-Sing Lam|Tang Man Chun|Wai-Hang Lau|Derek Tsang|Lawrence Chou|Song Xiao Cheng|Chuchu Zhou|Phat Chan|Nelson Lik-wai Yu|Yee Ting Chan|Ka-Sing Chan|Yeung Lai Nah|Silente Ng|Pierre Yu|Stephen Tsui|Ying Kwan Lok|Juno Mak|Simon Lee|Stanley Lo|Wai Lin Sun|Kwok Ming Ng|Apple Chow|Lin Gie Heng|Hak-Shing Keung
title: Wai dor lei ah yat ho
